fields.name: Follows
fields.value: I like to follow as wide a range of people as possible, I think that's healthy but I will not put up with overt rudeness, misogyny, sexism, transphobia, homophobia or extreme ideology. I'll just block and move on.

fields.name: Follows cont.
fields.value: No one has a right to my (or your) attention, interaction or time.

fields.name: Other stuff
fields.value: Love scifi, fantasy esp Vampire Werewolf stuff - Gail Carriager, Southern Vampire Mysteries, Rivers of London, The Abhorsen Chronicles, A Discovery of Witches, Terry Pratchett, Neil Gaiman, and the Dresden Files. Tolkien, Star Wars, Star Trek, Doctor Who
